News.Title: Umiya Buildcon Appoints Prabhugouda Biradar as Chief Technology Officer
News.Summary: Umiya Buildcon Limited appointed Mr. Prabhugouda Biradar as Chief Technology Officer effective December 1, 2025, bringing over 30 years of experience from senior roles at Philips, Cisco Systems, and Huawei. The strategic appointment aims to strengthen the company's Research & Development capabilities, accelerate indigenous telecom product development, and enhance its Make in India technology initiatives in the networking and telecom sector.

News.Title: Umiya Buildcon Reports Positive Quarterly Performance, Secures Land Allotment for New Manufacturing Plant
News.Summary: Umiya Buildcon Limited's Chairman and Managing Director presented a performance update to the Board of Directors on October 15, 2025, expressing satisfaction with the company's quarterly and half-yearly results. The company received final land allotment from the Government of Karnataka to establish a new state-of-the-art electronics manufacturing facility with a dedicated R&D center. Additionally, Umiya Buildcon launched MRO-TEK CORNUS Family 1G Switches, indigenous Layer-2 Gigabit switches with over 65% local content, designed for telecom operators, railways, industrial networks, and surveillance systems. The switches feature the company's proprietary MRO-OS and comply with RDSO and TEC standards. The Chairman emphasized the company's focus on operational excellence, innovative construction techniques, and expanding market presence while supporting India's Make in India initiative.

News.Title: Umiya Buildcon Reports Strong Q2 Performance with 333% Jump in Net Profit
News.Summary: Umiya Buildcon Limited reported net profit of Rs 585.86 lakhs for the quarter ended September 30, 2025, compared to Rs 135.33 lakhs in the same period last year. Total income reached Rs 1,686.54 lakhs versus Rs 1,352.55 lakhs in the previous year quarter. For the six-month period, net profit surged to Rs 3,725.08 lakhs from Rs 300 lakhs in the corresponding period. The company's other income included a significant profit of Rs 4,041.95 lakhs from the sale of property at Electronic City, Bangalore during the June 2025 quarter. Basic earnings per share for continuing operations stood at Rs 3.14 for the quarter. The company operates in three business segments: Products, Real Estate Development, and Solutions. The board had previously decided to discontinue Electronic Contract Manufacturing Services operations in January 2025.

News.Title: Umiya Buildcon Promoter Shareholding Increases to 64.18% in Q2 FY2026
News.Summary: Umiya Buildcon Limited reported an increase in promoter shareholding during the second quarter of FY 2025-26. Promoter stake rose from 60.95% (11,387,864 shares) as of June 30, 2025, to 64.18% (11,992,654 shares) as of September 30, 2025, through the acquisition of 604,790 shares from the open market. The company has scheduled its 4th board meeting for October 15, 2025, to consider and approve unaudited financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2025.

News.Title: Umiya Buildcon Secures 1-Acre Land Allotment for INR 26 Crore Manufacturing Facility in Karnataka
News.Summary: Umiya Buildcon Limited has received approval from the Government of Karnataka for a 1-acre land allotment in Adinarayana Hosahalli 2nd Phase Industrial Area, Bangalore Rural District. The company plans to establish an advanced manufacturing facility for data communication and networking products with an estimated investment of over INR 26 Crores. The facility will manufacture network and telecom gear with next-generation technologies to support India's Make in India initiative. The project is expected to create direct and indirect employment opportunities for over 150 individuals. The location offers established infrastructure including assured water and power supply, and is situated near Foxconn's iPhone manufacturing facility. The company's focus areas include deploying automated manufacturing lines, establishing an in-house R&D center, adopting environmentally responsible operations, developing proprietary products, and creating a Center of Excellence for precision manufacturing.

News.Title: Umiya Buildcon Signs MoU with A2000 Solutions for Drone Training Labs Under Tamil Nadu Technology Initiative
News.Summary: Umiya Buildcon Limited has signed a Memorandum of Understanding with A2000 Solutions Private Limited to develop structured drone training labs and expand into UAV technology. The partnership operates under the Tamil Nadu Future Technology Hubs (TNFTH) initiative, which aims to position Tamil Nadu as a global hub for next-generation technology and skilled talent. TNFTH is described as potentially Asia's first integrated hub uniting seven emerging technologies: Artificial Intelligence, Cyber security, Drone technology, Electric Vehicles, Internet of Things & sensors, 5G, and Enterprise Resource Planning. The initiative plans to establish hubs across 10 key locations in Tamil Nadu, starting with Tirunelveli. The training programs are designed to meet workforce needs across industries where drones are becoming essential. The partnership represents Umiya Buildcon's strategic expansion into next-generation technologies beyond its current dual-sector operations.

News.Title: MRO-TEK Realty: Rebrands as Umiya Buildcon Limited
News.Summary: MRO-TEK Realty Limited has officially changed its name to Umiya Buildcon Limited effective February 18, 2025. The rebranding is part of a strategic shift to expand focus in the real estate sector while maintaining its networking product business. The MRO-TEK brand will continue for networking and electronic products, with operations through its wholly-owned subsidiary, MRO-TEK Private Limited.
